nametagtweaks-fabric.duskconfig.title: Name Tag Tweaks Config
nametagtweaks-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_dro: If enabled, any name tag that drops on an entity's death will keep its named value.
nametagtweaks-fabric.duskconfig.droppedN: Dropped Name Tagby Entity Keeps Name Value
nametagtweaks-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_ena: If enabled, adds the /nametag <name> command. Used to change the name value without an anvil.
nametagtweaks-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_nam: If enabled, replaces underscores with spaces when using the /nametag command.
nametagtweaks-fabric.duskconfig.nameTagC: Name Tag Command Replace Underscores With Spaces
